title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management, secure payment processing, and admin dashboard. Features include product catalog, shopping cart, order tracking, and customer analytics.
results: Processed $500K+ in transactions, 5K+ active users, 99.9% uptime

title: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team workspaces, and project tracking. Includes drag-and-drop kanban boards, time tracking, and integrations with popular tools.
results: 3K+ daily active users, 95% user satisfaction, featured on Product Hunt

title: Social Media Dashboard
description: Analytics dashboard for social media management with multi-platform integration. Provides insights on engagement, growth metrics, content performance, and automated reporting.
results: Used by 50+ brands, tracks 1M+ social posts monthly

title: Learning Management System
description: Online learning platform with video courses, quizzes, progress tracking, and certificates. Features include course creation tools, student management, and payment integration.
